DOC.brief_summary: This study develop initially evaluate Sex Female Empowerment ( SAFE ) , intervention design increase acceptance adherence contraceptive practice among opioid-agonist-maintained woman childbearing age . The intervention deliver one two format : face-to-face brief intervention approach novel computer-adaptive platform . To extent either version SAFE find efficacious compare usual care , potential reduce number unintended pregnancy consequently decrease need cost child protective service .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1. age 1840 year old woman ; 2. able provide inform consent ; 3. currently enrol opioidagonistmaintenance program ; 4. currently pregnant ( urine test confirmation ) ; 5. report heterosexual orientation ; 6. tubal ligation sterilization ; 7. plan become pregnant next 6 month ; 8. provide verifiable locator information .
